s0081: He gave birth to Duke Wen.
s0082: Duke Wen of Qin first year, resided at Xichui Palace.
s0083: Third year, Duke Wen led 700 troops to hunt eastward.
s0084: Fourth year, arrived at the confluence of Qian and Wei.
s0085: He said: 'In ancient times, Zhou enfeoffed our ancestor Qin Ying here; later he finally became a lord.'
s0086: He divined for residence; the omen said auspicious, so he built a city there.
s0087: Tenth year, first established the Fu altar, using three sacrificial animals.
s0088: Thirteenth year, first had historians to record events; many people became civilized.
s0089: Sixteenth year, Duke Wen led troops to attack the Rong; the Rong were defeated and fled.
s0090: Therefore Duke Wen gathered the remaining Zhou people and possessed them; territory reached Qi, east of Qi he presented to Zhou.
s0091: Nineteenth year, obtained the Chen treasure.
s0092: Twentyå¹´, Duke Wen died, his son Duke Xiang ascended.
s0093: Duke Xiang of Qin first year, the Qin people moved to Qinyong.
s0094: Second year, began to build temples and palaces.
s0095: Third year, Duke Xiang died, his son Duke Ning ascended.
s0096: Duke Ning of Qin first year, the Rong attacked Qin.
s0097: Second year, Duke Ning died, his son Duke Wu ascended.
s0098: Duke Wu of Qin first year, attacked the Pengxi Rong.
s0099: Second year, established the Peng altar.
s0100: Third year, attacked the Daliang Rong.
s0101: Fourth year, Duke Wu died, his son Duke De ascended.
s0102: Duke De of Qin first year, the Rong attacked Qin.
s0103: Second year, began to use coins.
s0104: Third year, Duke De died, his son Duke Xuan ascended.
s0105: Duke Xuan of Qin first year, attacked the Jin Rong.
s0106: Second year, established the Jing altar.
s0107: Third year, Duke Xuan died, his son Duke Cheng ascended.
s0108: Duke Cheng of Qin first year, established the Yong altar.
s0109: Second year, Duke Cheng died, his son Duke Mu ascended.
s0110: Duke Mu of Qin first year, attacked the Mian Rong.
s0111: Second year, established the Zhao altar.
s0113: Fourth year, attacked the Rui Rong.
s0114: Fifth year, attacked the Xi Rong.
s0115: Sixth year, attacked the Qian Rong.
s0116: Seventh year, established the Wu altar.
s0119: Tenth year, Duke Mu died, his son Duke Kang ascended.
s0120: Duke Kang of Qin first year, attacked the Xi Qiang.
